00037 #include "egs_prism.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #include <vector>
00041 using std::vector;
00042 
00043 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismX("EGS_PrismX");
00044 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismY("EGS_PrismY");
00045 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prismZ("EGS_PrismZ");
00046 static EGS_PRISM_LOCAL string __prism("EGS_Prism");
00047 
00048 extern "C" {
00049 
00050     EGS_PRISM_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00051 
00052         if (!input) {
00053             egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): null input?\n");
00054             return 0;
00055         }
00056         string type;
00057         int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00058         if (err) {
00059             egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): missing 'type' input\n");
00060             return 0;
00061         }
00062         EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00063         vector<EGS_Float> p;
00064         err = input->getInput("points",p);
00065         if (err) {
00066             egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): missing 'points' input\n");
00067             return 0;
00068         }
00069         bool open = true;
00070         vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00071         err = input->getInput("closed",tmp);
00072         if (!err && tmp.size() == 2) {
00073             open = false;
00074         }
00075         bool p_open = false;
00076         int itmp;
00077         err = input->getInput("open triangle",itmp);
00078         if (!err && itmp == 1) {
00079             p_open = true;
00080         }
00081         if (input->compare(type,__prismX) || input->compare(type,__prismY)
00082                 || input->compare(type,__prismZ)) {
00083             int np = p.size()/2;
00084             if (np < 3) {
00085                 egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): at least 3 points are required "
00086                            "to construct a prism\n");
00087                 return 0;
00088             }
00089             vector<EGS_2DVector> points;
00090             for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00091                 points.push_back(EGS_2DVector(p[2*j],p[2*j+1]));
00092             }
00093             if (open) {
00094                 if (input->compare(type,__prismX))
00095                     g=new EGS_PrismX(new EGS_PolygonYZ(points,
00096                                                        EGS_XProjector(__prismX),p_open));
00097                 else if (input->compare(type,__prismY))
00098                     g=new EGS_PrismY(new EGS_PolygonXZ(points,
00099                                                        EGS_YProjector(__prismY),p_open));
00100                 else
00101                     g=new EGS_PrismZ(new EGS_PolygonXY(points,
00102                                                        EGS_ZProjector(__prismZ),p_open));
00103             }
00104             else {
00105                 if (input->compare(type,__prismX))
00106                     g=new EGS_PrismX(new EGS_PolygonYZ(points,
00107                                                        EGS_XProjector(__prismX),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00108                 else if (input->compare(type,__prismY))
00109                     g=new EGS_PrismY(new EGS_PolygonXZ(points,
00110                                                        EGS_YProjector(__prismY),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00111                 else
00112                     g=new EGS_PrismZ(new EGS_PolygonXY(points,
00113                                                        EGS_ZProjector(__prismZ),p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00114             }
00115         }
00116         else {
00117             int np = p.size()/3;
00118             if (np < 3) {
00119                 egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): at least 3 points are required"
00120                            " to construct a prism\n");
00121                 return 0;
00122             }
00123             vector<EGS_Vector> points;
00124             for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00125                 points.push_back(EGS_Vector(p[3*j],p[3*j+1],p[3*j+2]));
00126             }
00127             EGS_Vector aux(points[np-1]-points[0]);
00128             if (aux.length2() > 1e-6) {
00129                 points.push_back(points[0]);
00130             }
00131             np = points.size();
00132             EGS_Projector pro(points[0],points[1],points[np-2],__prism);
00133             vector<EGS_2DVector> p2;
00134             {
00135                 for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00136                     p2.push_back(pro.getProjection(points[j]));
00137                     EGS_Float d = pro.distance(points[j]);
00138                     if (fabs(d) > 1e-6) {
00139                         egsWarning("createGeometry(prism): "
00140                                    "points are not on a plane\n");
00141                         return 0;
00142                     }
00143                 }
00144             }
00145             if (open) {
00146                 g = new EGS_Prism(new EGS_Polygon(p2,pro,p_open));
00147             }
00148             else {
00149                 g = new EGS_Prism(new EGS_Polygon(p2,pro,p_open),tmp[0],tmp[1]);
00150             }
00151         }
00152         g->setName(input);
00153         g->setMedia(input);
00154         g->setLabels(input);
00155         return g;
00156     }
00157 
00158 }
